r.n: - Implement apcu_inc() and apcu_dec() using atomic operations. This means that these functions no longer have to acquire a write lock. These functions will now wraparound on overflow, instead of saturating to a floating point value. - Make table header in apc.php sticky. - Fix compile warnings related to mktemp() usage. - Fix compatibility with PHP 8.0. - Fix required number of arguments for apcu_store() returned by Reflection.
